languages.text: {n}Стоящий на коленях Соломон смотрит вам в глаза без тени раскаяния.{/n}
{n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоящий на коленях Соломон смотрит вам в глаза без тени раскаяния.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der vor dir kniende Solomorne sieht dir ohne das geringste Anzeichen von Reue in die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der vor dir kniende Solomorne sieht dir ohne das geringste Anzeichen von Reue in die Augen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À genoux, Solomorne vous regarde droit dans les yeux sans le moindre remords.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À genoux, Solomorne vous regarde droit dans les yeux sans le moindre remords.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙跪在地上，死死地盯着你的双眼，目光中没有一丝悔恨。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙跪在地上，死死地盯着你的双眼，目光中没有一丝悔恨。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, de rodillas, te mira a los ojos sin arrepentimiento alguno.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, de rodillas, te mira a los ojos sin arrepentimiento alguno.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ひざまずいたソロモーンは、後悔の念など微塵も感じさせず、あなたの目をじっと見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ひざまずいたソロモーンは、後悔の念など微塵も感じさせず、あなたの目をじっと見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dizlerinin üzerine çöken Solomorne, zerre pişmanlık belirtisi göstermeden gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, on his knees, looks you dead in the eye without a hint of remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dizlerinin üzerine çökmüş Solomorne, zerre pişmanlık belirtisi göstermeden gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}
